results.title: Long-term tolerability and efficacy of the combination of amlodipine/valsartan in hypertensive patients: a 54-week, open-label extension study.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Long-term treatment with the @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine_Valsartan_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068838 @@@amlodipine/valsartan@@@ 5/320 mg combination was well-tolerated.

citations.NLM: Philipp T, Glazer RD, Zhao Y, Pospiech R. Long-term tolerability and efficacy of the combination of amlodipine/valsartan in hypertensive patients: a 54-week, open-label extension study. Curr Med Res Opin. 2009 Jan;25(1):187-93. PMID: 19210151
